talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I know exactly how to thank you for your
help, but unfortunately the tools I need
are in my shop on the surface.
You see, there's <clr:0000>something special<clr:ffff> that
only certain people are able to craft...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But there's no way I could do such
precise work with the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>
raging aboveground.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>Such vivid colors... Not to brag, but my
heart swells every time I see the results
of my own skill...
Here you go—all yours.
talk0042:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>This is what I get for being so focused on gathering
materials that I don't even notice I've wandered
into a <clr:0000>Molduga's territory<clr:ffff>.
I'm safe up here on the high ground, but since
sound will attract it, I can't get down...

Hmph, and of course I don't have anything to
distract it with either.

And if I fall down from here... Well, <clr:0000>Molduga will
eat anything<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Go away, Molduga. Go away. Please...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>And now for the shield...


What do you think? Such vivid colors...
Not to brag, but my heart swells every
time I see the results of my own skill.
talk0043:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>I'm safe up here on the high ground, but since
Molduga are attracted to sound, I can't get down...

Hmph, and of course I don't have anything to
distract it with either.

And if I fall down from here... Well, <clr:0000>Molduga will
eat anything<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Go away, Molduga. Go away. Please...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I poured all my heart into my work.


I wish you good fortune in your travels.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh my... It looks like you don't have all
the materials I need to get to work.
talk0045: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You! Did you get rid of the Molduga?!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can make another <clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>
for you. I just need three diamonds, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo scimitar.
Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I can't believe you were able to defeat it!<sp:5:1:0>
You must be incredibly strong!

I never dreamed I'd run into a voe like you
way out here.

This must be fate. Don't you agree?


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>I'm <clr:0000>Isha<clr:ffff>. I run the jewelry shop in
<clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

I came all the way out here to try to find
some special things to add to jewelry...

But before I knew it, <sp:5:0:0>I somehow wandered
right into that Molduga's territory. If you
hadn't shown up, I'd have been its lunch.
Since you saved me, you have to let me
give you a <clr:0000>fitting reward<clr:ffff>.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you bring me bring me a diamond, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo shield, I can
make another <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff>.
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I can't believe you were able to defeat it!<sp:5:1:0>
You must be incredibly strong!

I never dreamed I'd run into a voe like you
way out here.

This must be fate. Don't you agree?


<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>I'm <clr:0000>Isha<clr:ffff>. I run the jewelry shop in
<clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>.

Since you saved me, you have to let me
give you a <clr:0000>fitting reward<clr:ffff>.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To make the <clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>
and the <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> for you, I need four
diamonds, 10 pieces of flint...
a Gerudo scimitar, and a Gerudo shield.


Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!
talk0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>This might come as a surprise, but I'm
actually the Gerudo's best blacksmith!

If you come visit my shop in <clr:0000>Gerudo Town<clr:ffff>,
there is <clr:0000>something special<clr:ffff> that I can craft
for you.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, wait.<sp:5:0:0> He's a voe, so he can't even get into town,
huh? <sp:5:0:0>But if he could beat that monster, I bet...

<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>I can feel fate's pull between us. I'm sure
we'll meet again.

All right, I'm going to head back to town
now that I don't have a <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>Molduga to worry
about! <sp:5:1:0>Sav'orq!
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Truth be told, I'd like to gather the
materials for you, but it is the duty of
the bearer of the arms to do that.
I'm sure it's a bit of a pain to do it, but...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I know you can do it.<sp:5:0:0> You're the voe
I chose, after all.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hm... That's strange...<sp:5:0:0> It appears that
both the Daybreaker and the Scimitar of
the Seven are not irretrievably lost.
The arms of the Seven form a bond with
their owner, you see.

That bond is only broken when their
recovery is impossible. Then, and only
then, <clr:0000>can they be remade<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You must do your best to find them.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I can make the <clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>
if you bring me three diamonds, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo scimitar.
Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>And I can make the <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> if you
bring me a diamond, five pieces of flint,
and a Gerudo shield.
talk0025: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> What a nice thing to say!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Today feels like it is shaping up to be
another scorcher...

Cara can help you find an accessory to
deal with the blazing heat. She's inside
the shop.
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can tell tonight is going to be a
chilly one...

Cara can help you find an accessory to
deal with the biting cold. She's inside
the shop.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>She's still got a ways to go before she'd
be ready to make something like the <clr:0000>arms
of the Seven<clr:ffff>...
Nevertheless, she's an exceptional
artisan—you'll be happy with anything
she sells you.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh dear... So your Scimitar of the Seven
is gone, then?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It is to be expected, really—all things fade
with time.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure the weapon was
grateful to have been of service.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can make another <clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>
for you. I just need three diamonds, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo scimitar.
Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you've got the materials with you, I can
get to crafting right away. Want me to
get started?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh dear... So your Daybreaker is
gone, then?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>It is to be expected, really—all things fade
with time.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure the weapon was
grateful to have been of service.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can make another <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> if you
bring me a diamond, five pieces of flint,
and a Gerudo shield.
If you've got the materials with you, I can
get to crafting right away. Want me to
get started?
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well? What do you think of my specially
crafted <clr:0000>arms of the Seven<clr:ffff>?

I made them to be used, not to gather
dust, so it would mean a lot to me if you
kept them close.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Oh dear... So you no longer have the <clr:0000>arms
of the Seven<clr:ffff>? Both the Daybreaker and
the Scimitar of the Seven are gone?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It is to be expected, really—all things fade
with time.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure the arms were
grateful to have been of service.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can make another <clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>
for you. I just need three diamonds, five
pieces of flint, and a Gerudo scimitar.
Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>And I can make another <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> if you
bring me a diamond, five pieces of flint,
and a Gerudo shield.
If you've got the materials with you, I can
get to crafting right away. What should I
get started on?
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hee-hee! <sp:5:0:0>Hylian voe say the cutest
things sometimes!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>I see... Well, if you decide you do want
me to make the arms for you again, just
come and talk to me.
I'm happy to help you out anytime.
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Well, I'm happy to see you too!
You're vasaaq anytime.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_00>Of course. This shouldn't take too long
at all.
talk0039: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh, what a nice voe you are!
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>It's because of you that I was able to
make it back to town<sp:5:0:0>. Sarqso.

I knew I'd see you again, of course, but I
wasn't sure it would be here!

And even more surprising... <sp:5:0:0>Not only do
you mean something special to me for
saving my life...
but you also are special to Lady Riju!<sp:5:0:0>
You really are a one-of-a-kind voe,
aren't you?
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>Hee-hee, this gorgeous curved blade can
only be made using a secret, closely
guarded technique!
Here you go—all yours.
